articles.title: Greetings from Kim Jong Il from V. Putin
Floral basket to Kim Jong Il from C.C., Communist Party of China
Congratulatory letters to Kim Jong Il from foreigners
articles.content:
Floral basket to Kim Jong Il from C.C., Communist Party of China 
    Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China on the occasion of his birthday.
 The basket was conveyed to an official concerned by Chinese ambassador to Korea Wang Guozhang on February 15.

articles.title: Floral basket to Kim Jong Il from Syrian President
articles.content:
Congratulatory letters to Kim Jong Il from foreigners 
    Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il yesterday received floral baskets and congratulatory letters from the military attaches corps and officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of different embassies here on the occasion of his birthday.
 Meanwhile, diplomatic envoys from Russia, China, India, Vietnam, Libya, Iran, Cambodia, Palestine, Laos, Syria Egypt, Nigeria, Indonesia, Ethiopia, Poland, Romania, Pakistan and Yemen and the Chinese and Ethiopian embassies presented floral baskets, gifts and congratulatory letters to him. 
 He also received congratulatory letters, gifts and bunches of flowers from military attaches of embassies of Vietnam, Russia, Cuba, Egypt and Iran and congratulatory letters from the resident coordinator of the united nations and resident representative of the UNDP, the representative of the UNICEF and the deputy representative of the WFP here.

articles.title: Foreign diplomats visit Kimjongilia Show
articles.content:
Floral basket to Kim Jong Il from Syrian President 
    Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from President of Syria Bashar al Assad, General Secretary of the Arab Socialist Baath Party and commander-in-chief of the army and armed forces, on the occasion of his birthday.
 The floral basket was conveyed to an official concerned by charge d'affaires ad interim of the Syrian ambassador here Haissam Saad on February 15.

articles.title: Ministry of People's Armed Forces hosts reception
articles.content:
Foreign diplomats visit Kimjongilia Show 
    Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of foreign embassies here visited the fifth Kimjongilia show on February 15 on the occasion of the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il. 
 They looked round kimjongilias, immortal flowers which have made their appearance carrying the infinite respects and reverence of the Korean people and progressive humankind.    
 They also visited Pyongyang Senior Middle School No. 1.

articles.title: Evening gala held
Banquet given for overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Evening gala held 
    Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- An evening gala was held by the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces at Jonsung Square of Pyongyang on Feb. 15  on the occasion of the birthday of supreme commander Kim Jong Il.
 Present there were Jo Myong Rok, director of the general political department of the Korean  People's Army, Kim Yong Chun, chief of the general staff of the KPA, and KPA officers and men.    
 Its participants danced to the tune of songs "Congratulations on February Holiday", "Song of Best Wishes" and others, extending highest glory and warmest congratulations to the supreme commander on his birthday being celebrated amid best wishes of all peoples.

articles.title: Turkish crewmen meet
Papers call for single-hearted unity
articles.content:
Turkish crewmen meet 
    Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting of crewmen of Turkish-flagged ship Pira was held in Kim Chaek Port on the east coast of Korea on Feb. 13 to celebrate the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il which falls on today.
 Speakers at the meeting said that the Korean people are building a powerful nation, demonstrating its might as the most dignified country in the world and the homeland of Juche where human dreams come true, despite manifold difficulties including the imperialists' blockade and natural disasters, under the great army-first revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, the genius of humankind and the greatest man.    
 Recalling that a bright prospect was opened for national reunification in Korea in the wake of the adoption of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration thanks to Kim Jong Il's superb tactics and extraordinary leadership last year, they said that his political ability with which he has brought about epochal changes and worked miracles has struck the world with admiration.

articles.title: KCU national joint meeting of organizations
10th International Figure Skating Festival for Paektusan Cup closes
